title: 权限组插件的groups文本错误问题
txt_content:
已经编辑文本，为什么还是没有权限，大神求解！！！{:10_501:}

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e[游客]&2'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: 
    - signedit.edit 
    - signedit.notify 
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.balance
    - essentials.balance.others
    - essentials.balancetop
    - essentials.chat.color
    - essentials.chat.question
    - essentials.chat.shout
    - essentials.compass
    - essentials.depth
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.ignore
    - essentials.kit
    - essentials.kit.tools
    - essentials.mail
    - essentials.mail.send
    - essentials.me
    - essentials.motd
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.nick
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.ping
    - essentials.portal
    - essentials.powertool
    - essentials.protect
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.signs.break.disposal
    - essentials.signs.break.mail
    - essentials.signs.break.protection
    - essentials.signs.break.trade
    - essentials.signs.create.disposal
    - essentials.signs.create.mail
    - essentials.signs.create.protection
    - essentials.signs.create.trade
    - essentials.signs.use.*
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.time
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - essentials.worth
    - essentials.sell hand
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - iConomy.help
    - iConomy.holdings
    - iConomy.payment
    - residence.create        

    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2[市民]&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: 
    - iConomy.*
    - coreprotect.*
    - essentials.* 
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - residence.admin
    - '*' 
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    - essentials.* 
    - iConomy.*
    - coreprotect.*
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - residence.admin
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.author: 黑喵菌
replies.txt_content:
540763589 发表于 2014-5-3 18:42
这会导致错误？
虽说java会自动忽略空白符，但还是把空白去掉较好。如果不行的话把error发生来，上面明确地说明了哪个用户组错误

replies.author: 黑喵菌
replies.txt_content: 你没发现 - residence.create 与inheritance:之间有好大一段空白吗？

黑喵菌 发表于 2014-5-3 17:49
你没发现 - residence.create 与inheritance:之间有好大一段空白吗？
这会导致错误？
